text: was a town located in Atetsu District, Okayama Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the town had an estimated population of 2,511 and a density of 18.41 persons per km². The total area was 136.37 km². On March 31, 2005, Shingō, along with the towns of Ōsa, Tessei and Tetta (all from Atetsu District), was merged into the expanded city of Niimi. Category:Dissolved municipalities of Okayama Prefecture
title: Shingō, Okayama
